practiceActivities.title: Personal Letters
practiceActivities.description: Write simple personal letters

content.prompt: Write a letter to a friend about your recent vacation. Include: where you went, what you did, and how you felt about it.
content.example:
Dear Sarah,

I hope you are well. I just returned from my vacation in Paris. It was wonderful!

I visited the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum. The weather was sunny and warm. I ate delicious French food every day.

I really enjoyed my trip. Paris is a beautiful city. I took many photos.

How are you? What have you been doing?

Best regards,
Maria

Best regards,
Maria

practiceActivities.title: Describing Experiences
practiceActivities.description: Practice describing personal experiences

content.example:
Last summer, I went to the beach with my family. We stayed in a small hotel near the ocean. The weather was sunny and warm every day.

We spent our time swimming in the sea and walking on the beach. I also tried surfing for the first time. It was difficult but fun.

The food was delicious, especially the fresh seafood. We ate at local restaurants every evening.

I really enjoyed my vacation. It was relaxing and exciting at the same time. I would like to go back next year.
